item.description:
Let's all enjoy the week before Xmas and Yankee Swap (under $10 please). This is just for fun with friends and this time no beating up, skunking, or picking on Micki.

Emad, I am sorry I mis-spelled your name, not only all night, but even in my remarks :( :( But welcome to our Cribbage World. And truly hope to see you again at cribbage.

Sue hope Mickey Mouse (and the cheerleaders) treat you really well for the next two weeks.

Karen also who is going away and ME too ! ! ! :) sweet

Bette, I am very happy about your ACC accomplishments in NH and hope that is where you continue your success :)

Teresa, congratulations on becoming a foster Mom, Erin is absolutely adorable.

Laura, you have this month only to twenty dabble :)

Missed you Dave, Alain and whoever other male cribbages with us :) How soon I forget :(
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the "back room" with our cribbage boards out and ready
item.name: Waltham Cribbage Meet Up (Yankee Swap $10 max) F*U*N, F*U*N
